name: Target Sky Duck Fly 3D
description:
Target Sky Duck Fly 3D is a shooting & adventure game in which you can shoot and hunt many birds in jungle Environment.
Features:
Hunt different type of birds
Latest sniper rifle with scope to zoom in and zoom out
High quality 3D graphics and soothing sound effects
Realistic controls for best shooting experience
Easy control with challenging game play
Awesome safari jungle environment near hills
Hunt and enjoy the stunning jungle environment
